name: Wenjia
description: Wenjia is a 2D platform game with puzzle-solving elements. Players can freely travel between two realms (the material world and the energy world), each of them with different challenges and obstacles. Players must utilize both realms’ mechanisms to reach their final goal.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6400 @ 2.13GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 730 OR  Radeon HD 4830 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 OR Radeon HD 7750 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
